sql-service.query:
select * from ( select SU.USER_NAME, USER_ID, SU.DESCRIPTION, to_char(SU.START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') START_DATE , to_char(SU.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') END_DATE, decode(SU.FROZEN_FLAG, 'Y', '已冻结', '未冻结') P_FROZEN_FLAG, SU.FROZEN_FLAG, to_char(SU.FROZEN_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') FROZEN_DATE, (SELECT EE.EMPLOYEE_CODE FROM EXP_EMPLOYEES EE WHERE EE.EMPLOYEE_ID = SU.EMPLOYEE_ID) EMPLOYEE_CODE, (SELECT EE.NAME FROM EXP_EMPLOYEES EE WHERE EE.EMPLOYEE_ID = SU.EMPLOYEE_ID) EMPLOYEE_NAME from sys_user su )
#WHERE_CLAUSE#
